name: Chicken Parmesan Bake
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds chicken tenders, cut into bite-size pieces
8 ounces whole milk mozzarella cheese, shredded or crumbled
utensils: 9x7" baking dish or similar size pan

instructions.en: Beat egg white in a pie plate until frothy.
Mix pork rind crumbs and seasonings in another pie plate.
Coat chicken pieces in egg white, then in pork rind mixture.
Fry coated chicken pieces in hot oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.
Arrange fried chicken in a single layer in baking dish.
Pour marinara sauce evenly over chicken.
Top with mozzarella cheese, then sprinkle parmesan cheese over everything.
Bake at 350ยบ for 20-30 minutes until cheese is melted and sauce is bubbly.

notes: Makes 4 servings. Amy's Marinara Sauce is assumed to be a separate recipe.
